Name: minimize_total_project_cost
Description: Minimize the total budget consumed across all projects.

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average amount of work (story points) a team can complete per sprint.

Name: minimize_blocker_resolution_time
Description: Minimize the average time between a blocker being detected and resolved.

Name: maximize_feature_priority_score
Description: Maximize the total sum of priority scores for features selected in a release.

Name: minimize_sprint_planning_duration
Description: Minimize the total time spent in sprint planning meetings.

Name: maximize_team_availability
Description: Maximize the cumulative availability of all team members.

Name: minimize_task_effort_variance
Description: Minimize the difference between estimated and actual effort for tasks.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the average influence level of satisfied stakeholders.

Name: minimize_technical_debt
Description: Minimize the number of features or stories with a status indicating incomplete technical quality.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the number of sprints where the achievement status is marked as complete.
